constructor(
      address operator,
      uint256 finalizationDelay,
      uint256 submissionDelay,
      uint256 penaltyDelay,
      uint256 bond,
      string name,
      string version,
      uint256 chainId,
      bytes32 genesis)
transfer(address,uint256)
balanceOf(address)
deposit(address account, address token) external

commitRoot(bytes32 merkleTreeRoot, uint256 token,
        uint256 fee, bytes transactions) external
commitBlock(uint32 minimum, bytes32 minimumHash, uint32 height, bytes32[] roots) external
commitWitness(bytes32 transactionId) external
commitAddress(address addr) external returns (uint256 id)

proveMalformedBlock(bytes blockHeader, bytes rootHeader,
        uint16 rootIndex, bytes transactions) external
proveInvalidTransaction(bytes transactionProof) external
proveInvalidInput(bytes proofA, bytes proofB) external
proveDoubleSpend(bytes proofA, bytes proofB) external
proveInvalidWitness(bytes transactionProof, bytes inputProofs) external
proveInvalidSum(bytes transactionProof, bytes inputProofs) external
withdraw(bytes proof) external
bondWithdraw(bytes blockHeader) external
witnessAt(address account, uint32 blockNumber) external view returns (bytes32 transactionId)
funnel(address account) external view returns (address)
verifyHeader(bytes blockHeader, bytes root, uint256 rootIndex, uint8 assertFinalized) external view returns (bool)
verifyTransaction(bytes proof, uint8 assertFinalized) external view returns (bool)

selectUTXO(bytes proof) external view returns (
        bytes32 transactionId,
        uint8 outputIndex,
        uint8 outputType,
        address owner,
        uint256 amount,
        uint32 token,
        bytes32 digest,
        uint256 expiry,
        address returnOwner)
selectOutput(bytes proof) external view returns (bytes output)
outputMetadata(bytes proof) external view returns (uint256 metadata)
inputMetadata(bytes proof) external view returns (uint256 metadata)
selectMetadata(bytes proof, uint8 index) external view returns (bytes8 metadata)
operator() external view returns (address operator)
blockTip() external view  returns (uint256 blockTip)
numTokens() external view  returns (uint256 numTokens)
tokenId(address token) external view  returns (uint256 tokenId)
numAddresses() external view  returns (uint256 numAddresses)
addressId(address owner) external view  returns (uint256 addressId)
depositAt(address account, uint32 token, uint32 blockNumber) external view  returns (uint256 amount)
blockCommitment(uint256 blockHeight) external view  returns (bytes32 blockHash)
rootBlockNumberAt(bytes32 root) external view  returns (uint256 blockNumber)
isWithdrawalProcessed(uint256 blockHeight, bytes32 withdrawalId) external view returns (bool withdrawn)
BOND_SIZE() external view returns (uint256)
MAX_ROOT_SIZE() external view returns (uint256)
SUBMISSION_DELAY() external view returns (uint256)
FINALIZATION_DELAY() external view returns (uint256)
PENALTY_DELAY() external view returns (uint256)
penalty() external view returns (uint256)
name() external view returns (string)
version() external view returns (string)
event TokenIndexed(address indexed token, uint256 indexed id)
event AddressIndexed(address indexed owner, uint256 indexed id)

event BlockCommitted(
        address producer,
        uint256 numTokens,
        uint256 numAddresses,
        bytes32 indexed previousBlockHash,
        uint256 indexed height,
        bytes32[] roots)

event RootCommitted(
          bytes32 indexed root,
          address rootProducer,
          uint256 feeToken,
          uint256 fee,
          uint256 rootLength,
          bytes32 indexed merkleTreeRoot,
          bytes32 indexed commitmentHash)

event WitnessCommitted(
        address indexed owner,
        uint256 blockNumber,
        bytes32 indexed transactionId)
event FraudCommitted(uint256 indexed previousTip, uint256 indexed currentTip, uint256 indexed fraudCode)
event DepositMade(address indexed owner, uint32 indexed token, uint256 value)

event WithdrawalMade(
          address indexed owner,
          address tokenAddress,
          uint256 amount,
          uint32 indexed blockHeight,
          uint32 rootIndex,
          bytes32 indexed transactionLeafHash,
          uint8 outputIndex,
          uint32 transactionIndex)
